ygData.subject: RE: Snakeskinq
ygData.msgSnippet: no the gloves do not hit magical. But hang on to them, as when you reach 30, your punches become magical all on their own. Praelor Dileasai
ygData.messageBody:
no the gloves do not hit magical. But hang on to them, as when you reach 30,
your punches become magical all on their own.

Praelor Dileasai


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bennett, Brian [SMTP:BRIAN.BENNETT@...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 8:37 AM
> To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Snakeskinq
>
> Just picked up snakeskin gloves last night in paw. My question: Do these
> hit magical, i.e. Ghouls and Ice Bones? Or do I need to hang on to my
> already over-used Mesh Gauntlets? The dex bonus on those babies is nice,
> and I would hate to have to hot key switching gloves around :)
>
> And if you're wondering why I'm asking instead of just trying it out, it's
> because I was tired and couldn't track down something magical where I was
> *grin*
>
> Arrek
> Quellious
>
>
>
>
